br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator
Class JSR303Validator

java.lang.Object
  br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.JSR303Validator
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanValidator
@RequestScoped
@Component
public class JSR303Validator
extends java.lang.Object
implements BeanValidator

Implements the BeanValidator using the JSR303 - BeanValidation. This implementation will be enable by vraptor when the hibernate validator classes is locale in classpath.

Since:
3.1.2
Author:
Ot√°vio Scherer Garcia

Method Detail

validate

public java.util.List<Message> validate(java.lang.Object bean)
Description copied from interface: BeanValidator
Validate the bean and return a list of messages if has constraint violations. If the object is null, an empty list will be returned.

Specified by:
validate in interface BeanValidator
Parameters:
bean - The object to be validated.
Returns:
List of constraint violations.
